main_definition: In general, June refers to the sixth month of the Gregorian calendar. It is also an idiomatic expression with various meanings related to specific contexts or situations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to a period of time in June
meanings_and_examples.example: We planned our vacation for the month of June.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression used when talking about something that happened or will happen during the month of June
meanings_and_examples.example: Our team won their first championship game in June 2015.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A nickname for a female person, derived from the name 'June' which is traditionally associated with young women and girls
meanings_and_examples.example: My sister was named JUNE when she was born.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiomatic expression used in some contexts to indicate that something will happen soon or at the beginning of a period, often June for planning purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm starting my new job next month. I'll be busy with training in June.
